## TokenDropImpl class

Create a Drop contract for a standard crypto token or cryptocurrency.

## Example

```javascript
import { ThirdwebSDK } from "@thirdweb-dev/sdk";

const sdk = new ThirdwebSDK("{{chainName}}");
const contract = sdk.getTokenDrop("{{contract_address}}");
```

| [(constructor)(network, address, storage, options, abi, contractWrapper)](./sdk.tokendropimpl._constructor_.md) |           | Constructs a new instance of the <code>TokenDropImpl</code> class |
